text: Mũnene ũcio wa mbũtũ agĩcooka agĩĩta anene aake eerĩ a thigari igana rĩmwe akĩmaatha atĩrĩ, “Haarĩriai gĩkundi gĩa thigari magana meerĩ, na thigari mĩrongo mũgwanja iria ithiiaga ihaicĩte mbarathi, na thigari magana meerĩ iria ithiiaga ikuuĩte matimũ, nĩguo mathiĩ Kaisarea thaa ithatũ cia ũtukũ.
